title: The Emperor's new armour
brief_description: A humorous animated film which comments on consumerism and the arms race. Presents a story about an emperor who is persuaded by three glib salesmen to buy a made-to-measure, deluxe, drip-dry, stainless steel, suit of ‘soft’ armour which he does not need and which his kingdom cannot afford.
